bug.short_desc: Unable to edit My Documents path
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem:
When attempting to edit the My Documents path the path selection dialog will not close with either Cancel or OK.
You are forced to close the underlying Tools|Options|Paths dialog using its close button (X) in the title bar. This removes both dialogs.
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable):
libreoffice-opensymbol-fonts-5.1.4.2-4.fc24.noarch libreoffice-ure-5.1.4.2-4.fc24.x86_64 libreoffice-calc-5.1.4.2-4.fc24.x86_64 libreoffice-impress-5.1.4.2-4.fc24.x86_64 libreoffice-pyuno-5.1.4.2-4.fc24.x86_64 libreoffice-base-5.1.4.2-4.fc24.x86_64 libreoffice-math-5.1.4.2-4.fc24.x86_64 libreoffice-emailmerge-5.1.4.2-4.fc24.x86_64 libreoffice-writer2latex-1.0.2-19.fc24.x86_64 libreoffice-data-5.1.4.2-4.fc24.noarch libreoffice-writer-5.1.4.2-4.fc24.x86_64 libreoffice-langpack-en-5.1.4.2-4.fc24.x86_64 libreoffice-xsltfilter-5.1.4.2-4.fc24.x86_64 libreoffice-draw-5.1.4.2-4.fc24.x86_64 libreoffice-core-5.1.4.2-4.fc24.x86_64 libreofficekit-5.1.4.2-4.fc24.x86_64 libreoffice-filters-5.1.4.2-4.fc24.x86_64 libreoffice-pdfimport-5.1.4.2-4.fc24.x86_64 libreoffice-gtk3-5.1.4.2-4.fc24.x86_64 libreoffice-graphicfilter-5.1.4.2-4.fc24.x86_64
How reproducible:
Every time.
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open a libreoffice application. I used Writer. 2. Select Tools|Paths, highlight My Documents and click the Edit button. 3. Choose your new My Documents path and click the OK button.
Actual results:
At step 3 above, the My Documents path selection dialog persists. You have to close the underlying Tools|Paths dialog with its close button (X) in the title bar.
Expected results:
The My Documents path selection dialog should close and the My Documents path should be updated.
Additional info:
The only GNOME Shell changes I have are: 1) I use the DashToDock extension 2) I have disabled the GNOME Shell Application menu integration.
Yup, dialog isn't destroyed at a useful time so it stays around after its "closed"

I don't know if other path dialogs are affected in a similar manner.
I was casually browsing the path settings and wanted to change My Documents and Templates to reflect the directories in my home.
There was no problem adding ~/Templates to the Templates path.
